sections.heading: Trespass; exemption from liability
sections.text: The county surveyor in the performance of his official duties, shall not be liable to prosecution for trespass.SourceLaws 1913, c. 43, § 4, p. 143;R.S.1913, § 5690;C.S.1922, § 5020;C.S.1929, § 26-1606;R.S.1943, § 23-1906.AnnotationsCounty surveyor, when in performa
